question: 表彰
sourceMnemonic: You want people to <kanji>express</kanji> how they feel about you in a <kanji>clear</kanji> manner, so you demand they give you <vocabulary>public acknowledgement</vocabulary>. You want clear, concise <vocabulary>public recognition</vocabulary> for all of your amazing talents, skills, and for reaching level 50 of WaniKani. Maybe they'll throw you a parade!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
